flavorText: Overcoming extinction has only made the slivers more determined to live.

foreignData.flavorText: Das drohende Aussterben stärkte den Überlebenswillen der Remasuris nur noch mehr.
foreignData.name: Plattenpanzerremasuri

foreignData.flavorText: Superar la extinción sólo ha dado a los fragmentados más empeño para vivir.
foreignData.name: Fragmentado de placas

foreignData.flavorText: Échapper à l'extinction n'a fait que renforcer l'instinct de survie des slivoïdes.
foreignData.name: Slivoïde à plaques

foreignData.flavorText: L'imminente estinzione ha solo reso i tramutanti più determinati a sopravvivere.
foreignData.name: Tramutante Corazzato

foreignData.flavorText: Superar a extinção só fez os fractius tornarem-se mais determinados a viver.
foreignData.name: Fractius de Couraça

name: Plated Sliver

rulings.text: Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.
If the creature type of a Sliver changes so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures.
